mapper.select: select * from BOARD order by SEQ desc limit #{startRow}, #{listLimit};
mapper.insert: insert into Board(WRITER, EMAIL, SUBJECT, CONTENT, RDATE) values(#{writer}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update BOARD set WRITER=#{writer}, EMAIL=#{email}, SUBJECT=#{subject}, CONTENT=#{content}, RDATE=NOW() where SEQ=#{seq}
